amendment.description: To provide for a serve flooding and drought management study of the greater Mississippi River Basin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 906 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 906 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 906 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 906 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Durbin.
